definition: a journey in a vehicle (usually an automobile), harass with persistent criticism or carping
details:
noun
- a journey in a vehicle (usually an automobile)
= synonyms: drive
- a mechanical device that you ride for amusement or excitement
verb
- harass with persistent criticism or carping
= synonyms: rally
- copulate with
= synonyms: mount
- keep partially engaged by slightly depressing a pedal with the foot
= example: keep partially engaged by slightly depressing a pedal with the foot
- move like a floating object
- ride over, along, or through
- be carried or travel on or in a vehicle
= example: be carried or travel on or in a vehicle
- sit and travel on the back of animal, usually while controlling its motions
= synonyms: sit
- climb up on the body
= example: climb up on the body
- sit on and control a vehicle
= example: sit on and control a vehicle
- continue undisturbed and without interference
= example: continue undisturbed and without interference
- lie moored or anchored
= example: lie moored or anchored
- be contingent on
= example: be contingent on
= synonyms: turn on, depend on, devolve on, depend upon, hinge on, hinge upon
- have certain properties when driven
= example: have certain properties when driven
= synonyms: drive
- be sustained or supported or borne
